articles.author: Rónán Duffy and Lauren Boland
articles.title: EU Parliament Ukraine rapporteur says Mick Wallace and Clare Daly are 'politically irrelevant' and 'marginal' - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Last week, Wallace and Daly were two of just 13 MEPs who voted against a European Parliament resolution on Ukraine.
articles.content:
THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENTS Standing Rapporteur on Ukraine has described Irish MEPs Mick Wallace and Clare Daly as politically irrelevant and has questioned their motivations.
German MEP Michael Gahler… [+2242 chars]

articles.description: Oil price, on Tuesday, surged to $130 a barrel amid oversupply fears triggered by a potential US and European ban on Russian oil imports. Brent crude futures, the global benchmark,
articles.content:
Oil price, on Tuesday, surged to $130 a barrel amid oversupply fears triggered by a potential US and European ban on Russian oil imports.

articles.title: TD customer questions $50 charge for donating to Ukraine aid efforts. The bank is now among those waiving fees - CBC.ca
articles.description: A Toronto woman is questioning TD Bank after she was charged —  but later reimbursed — a $50 fee for donating to Ukrainian relief efforts several days after Russia unilaterally invaded the country in Eastern Europe.

articles.title: Ford lance la Mustang California Special cabriolet pour la première fois en Europe - Maroc-Actu
articles.content:
